roleset.name: shared by all

example.name: empty it
example.text: I jumped around listening to the usual suspects ' appraisal of this commercial from last night 's game and it was fairly universal that Republicans -LRB- the talking heads , not the voters -RRB- hated this commercial and the Democrats loved it .
example.arg: that Republicans -LRB- the talking heads , not the voters -RRB- hated this commercial and the Democrats loved it

example.name: both args
example.text: If there is one thing that [*] is universal to all websites, it is the login process.
